title: In Ayodhya, homestays emerge as new business opportunity for locals
description: As Ayodhya prepares for the opening of the Ram temple on January 22, the Uttar Pradesh government is encouraging the development of homestays in the temple town. About 500 operators of homestays, including individuals and hotel groups like Radisson, Taj, and Marriott, anticipate a hospitality boom.
